chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Sharmad Zeffar, p. 31 (28)—Coppery-skinned, plump woman who came to the Two Rivers after the Trolloc attacks subsided. She fled Arad Doman when the Seanchan attacked Almoth Plain and civil war broke out in her homeland. She and Rhea Avin are fighting over Wil al'Seen. See also al'Seen, Wil; Avin, Rhea.
